Hello, my name is John Joseph and I'm a Web Developer.

This is where I put small things that I make in my spare time. Most are works in progress.

Juice - A drum sequencer made using the Web Audio API.

Tetris - Tetris in JS. Arrows or buttons.

Space Invaders - Simple Space Invaders made with Canvas API. Arrows or buttons.

Smooth Horizontal Scroll NPM - GitHub - Horizontal scroll in vanilla JS. No deps.

Moovn On - A site that provides information for people who are moving.

Memory - Classic memory game.
